### Checklist

<!-- Ensure all items are complete before submitting -->

#### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] All linting passes without errors

#### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have added/updated relevant comments in configuration files

#### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or my feature works
- [ ] New and existing tests pass locally
- [ ] Benchmark results show no performance regression

#### Security

- [ ] My changes do not introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not exposed any sensitive information
- [ ] Security-related settings follow best practices
